Package org.openwms.common.comm.app

Class DriverConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openwms.common.comm.app.DriverConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationEventPublisherAware
    @Configuration
@IntegrationComponentScan
@EnableIntegration
public class DriverConfiguration
extends Object
implements org.springframework.context.ApplicationEventPublisherAware
    A DriverConfiguration is the main Spring configuration class to setup all TCP/IP connections like configured in project specific configuration files. Multiple driver instances can be bootstrapped each in a different mode, like Duplex, Client or Server.
    Author:
    Heiko Scherrer
